titleStmt.title: A fine companion Acted before the King and Queene at White-hall, and sundrie times with great applause at the private house in Salisbury Court, by the Prince his Servants. Written by Shakerley Marmyon.
titleStmt.author: Marmion, Shackerley, 1603-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes for Richard Meighen, next to the Middle Temple gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Chapin Library.
